name: Opengds.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Open GOOP Development Suite

How to get started: You need to clone the Repository into your LabVIEW20XX folder (currently the Master branch is in LabVIEW2012).
To do this you can clone it into a temporary directory and then copy this into the LabVIEW-folder.
In Windows: 
```
git clone https://github.com/opengds/OpenGDS.git c:\LabVIEW2012-temp 
xcopy C:\labview2012-temp C:\Program Files (x86)\National Instruments\LabVIEW 2012 /H /Y /R /S
```
You can find build releases here:

[OpenGDS 1.0.3(Master) LV2012-32](http://www.holmstroms.eu/OpenGDS/OpenGDS_1.0.3(Master)_LV2012-32.zip)

[OpenGDS 1.0.3(Master) LV2012-64](http://www.holmstroms.eu/OpenGDS/OpenGDS_1.0.3(Master)_LV2012-64.zip)

[OpenGDS 1.0.3(Master) LV2013-32](http://www.holmstroms.eu/OpenGDS/OpenGDS_1.0.3(Master)_LV2013-32.zip)

[OpenGDS 1.0.3(Master) LV2013-64](http://www.holmstroms.eu/OpenGDS/OpenGDS_1.0.3(Master)_LV2013-64.zip)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
